io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.effectbuilder

Interface EffectBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExplodeEffectBuilder, FadeEffectBuilder, FlowEffectBuilder, HighlightEffectBuilder, RandomEffectBuilder, WheelEffectBuilder

    public interface EffectBuilder
    The EffectBuilder model for the six primary Aurora effect types.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Effect build()
      Creates a new Effect of the current effect type.
      EffectBuilder setColorType(java.lang.String colorType)
      Sets the color type of the effect.
      EffectBuilder setLoop(boolean loop)
      Sets whether of not the effect should loop.
      EffectBuilder setName(java.lang.String name)
      Sets the name of the effect.
      EffectBuilder setPalette(Color[] palette)
      Sets the palette of the effect.
